name: OOX: Create Auction
title: Create NFT Auction
description: Create an auction for your NFT or SFT on OOX marketplace. Set minimum and maximum bid prices, deadline, and accepted payment token.

inputs.name: NFT
inputs.description: The NFT or SFT to auction.

inputs.name: Min Bid
inputs.description: Minimum bid amount in the accepted payment token.

inputs.name: Max Bid
inputs.description: Maximum bid amount (set to 0 for no maximum).

inputs.name: Deadline
inputs.description: Auction deadline timestamp (Unix timestamp in seconds).

inputs.name: Payment Token
inputs.description: Accepted payment token identifier (EGLD for eGold, or ESDT token identifier).
